body:
Comment 3: 
In my copy of src/pkg/go/build/build.go, line 364 tests for a local import.  I'm not
sure how that is relevant to a difference between gc and gccgo.

What do you see if you run "go build -x -compiler gccgo" ?

Have you tried using tip?

Have you tried using the version of the go tool from a gc installation, rather than
building it with gccgo?
